Report.Description: Sends Report to Servers Mod Log

Server Rank.Description: Sends Your or Mentioned Member's Rank with %bot in Current Server

Global Rank.Description: Sends your Current Global Rank with %bot or Checks Mentioned Member's Rank

Server Leaderboard.Description: Shows Top 500 Users on Server's Leaderboard

Global Leaderboard.Description: Shows Top 500 Users on Global Leaderboard

Vote Leaderboard.Description: Shows Top 500 Users on Vote Leaderboard

Reminder.Description: Sets a Reminder for the Mentioned Message
Info: Days: d, Hours: h, Minutes: m, Seconds: s

Weather.Description: Sends the Weather of the Mentioned Zipcode

Word Definition.Description: Sends the Definition of the Mentioned Word

Urban Dictionary.Description: Sends the Definition from the Urban Dictionary of the Mentioned Word

Translate.Description: Translates Message or Text with Google Translator
Invoke: translate <Language to Translate to> <Text tor Translate>

Meme.Description: Sends a random Meme to the Current Channel

Akinator.Description: Start a Game of Akinator (Guess Your Character)

Website Screenshot.Description: Sends Screenshot of the Mentioned Website

Video & Song Downloader.Description: Downloads & Displays Specified Song or Video

ASCII Art.Description: Create ASCII Art of Your or Specified Member's Avatar or for Attached Photo
Invoke: ascii <Scale of ASCII> <Gray Scale of ASCII> <Width Correction>

Phone.Description: Sends your Message to All Servers with Phone Setup

Words of Wisdom (8-Ball).Description: Sends Words of Wisdom to Answer Your Question

Dice Roll.Description: Rolls a Standard Dice with 6 Sides
Info: (You may include Number to Change the Amount of Sides however it's Not Required)

Coin Flip.Description: Flips a Coin & Reveals the Side
Info: (You may include Your Guess however it's Not Required)

Rock Paper Scissors.Description: Play RPS with %bot... Best 2 out of 3?

Echo.Description: Sends your Message but in an Embed

Advanced Echo Embed.Description: Sends your Title & Message in an Embed

Clean Echo Embed.Description: Sends your Message in an Embed

Server Stats.Description: Sends Detailed Stats of Current Server or Mentioned Server

Member Info.Description: Sends Detailed Information on You or Mentioned User

Channel Info.Description: Sends Detailed Information on Current Channel or Mentioned Channel

Role Info.Description: Sends Detailed Information on Mentioned Role

Emoji Info.Description: Sends Unicode Information on an Emoji

Discord.py Lookup.Description: Sends Links of Search Results from Discord.py Documentation

Python Lookup.Description: Sends Links of Search Results from Python Documentation

Signed iOS Versions.Description: Sends All iOS Versions currently beinged signed by Apple

iOS Tweak Lookup.Description: Sends Information about the Mentioned Tweak

iOS Updates.Description: Sets Channel to Receive iOS Updates in

Pokemon Go Events.Description: Shows All Current & Upcoming Pokemon Go Events

Pokemon Go Updates.Description: Sets Channel to Receive Pokemon Go Event Updates in

CoC Player Info.Description: Sends Information on about Mentioned Clash of Clans Player Tag

CoC Clan Info.Description: Sends Information on about Mentioned Clash of Clans Clan Tag

Bot Information.Description: Sends Information from Top.gg & Discord Bots for Mentioned Bot

Votes.Description: Sends your Upvotes for %bot or Checks Mentioned Member's Upvotes for %bot

Server Account Information.Description: Shows Information About Current Server's Subscription Account

Link Server Account.Description: Links Your Server Subscription Account to Your Discord Account

Info: (You or %bot must be Connected to a Voice Channel)

Queue.Description: Adds Song you Mentioned to the Queue to be Played
Info: (%bot must be Connected to a Voice Channel & Playing Music Already)

Join.Description: Connects %bot to the Mentioned Voice Channel

Pause.Description: Pauses the Music that is Currently being Played

Resume.Description: Resumes Playing the Music that is Paused

Skip.Description: Skips the Song that is Currently being Played

Stop.Description: Stops the Music that is Currently being Played & Disconnects %bot from Voice Chat

Queue List.Description: Shows All Songs that is Currently in the Queue

Download.Description: Creates a MP3 Download for Specified Song

Bag.Description: Shows Mentioned Member or your Items in the Server

Storage.Description: Shows Currency & Items in your or Mentioned Member's Storage

Balance.Description: Shows Balance for you or Mentioned Member

Shop.Description: Shows Shop for the Server or Mentioned Member

Buy.Description: Purchase Item from Server Shop or Mentioned Member

Daily Rewards.Description: Grants Random Amount of Currency every 24 hours

Selling.Description: Shows Shop for you or Mentioned Member

Sell.Description: Lists Item in your Shop for the given Price

Clear Listings.Description: Clears All Items in your Shop

Transfer.Description: Transfers Currency from your Balance to Mentioned Member

Give.Description: Transfers Item from your Bag to Mentioned Member

Deposit.Description: Deposit Currency into your Savings Account

Store.Description: Removes Item from Bag and Adds it into your Storage Box

Take.Description: Removes Item from Storage Box and Adds it into your Bag

Apply.Description: Apply for an Account to use the Economy System

Rent.Description: Apply for a Savings Account & Security Box

Register.Description: Registers the Server to use the Economy System

Admin Deposit.Description: Deposits Currency from to Mentioned Member

Item.Description: Adds Item to Server Shop for the given Price

Clear Shop.Description: Clears All Items in Server Shop

Bag Limit.Description: Sets the Limit for Bag Storage

Security Box Limit.Description: Sets the Limit for Security Box Storage

Server Start Balance.Description: Sets the Starting Amount of Currency for the Server

User Start Balance.Description: Sets the Starting Amount of Currency for New Member's for the Server

Ticket Category.Description: Sets Category to Receive Tickets in

Create Ticket.Description: Creates Ticket Creator in Specified Channel

Check Vouches.Description: Shows Mentioned Member or Your Vouches

Vouch.Description: Sends Vouch for Mentioned Member to Vouch Queue for Approval

Revouch.Description: Revouches for a Vouch you Submitted

Bump.Description: Bumps Server in [%bot's Support Server](<%support_server>) and All Servers with Bump Setup
Info: (Must Set Server's Description, & Server's Invite Before you can Successfully Bump)

Bumpset.Description: Sets Channel to Receive Bump Feed in

Preview.Description: Shows Preview of Current Server's Bump Advertisement

Warn.Description: Warns Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Remove Warnings.Description: Removes Specified Warning from Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Clear Warnings.Description: Clears Warnings from Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Mute.Description: Adds Muted Role to Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Unmute.Description: Removes Muted Role from Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Timed Mute.Description: Adds Muted Role to Mentioned User for Specified Specified Time & Reason
Info: Days: d, Hours: h, Minutes: m, Seconds: s

Kick.Description: Kicks Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Ban.Description: Bans Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Soft Ban.Description: Soft Bans Mentioned User for Specified Reason

Add Role.Description: Adds Mentioned Role to Mentioned User

Remove Role.Description: Removes Mentioned Role from Mentioned User

Mass Add Role.Description: Adds Mentioned Role to All Members

Mass Remove Role.Description: Removes Mentioned Role from All Members

Ping Role.Description: Sends your Message in an Embed & Pings the Mentioned Role

Hire.Description: Sends Configured Message for Role to Mentioned Member

Rolemenu.Description: Rolemenu that Users React to get Corresponding Role

Poll.Description: Creates Poll for Users to Vote On

Giveaway.Description: Starts Giveaway in Mentioned Channel for Specified Amount of Time with Specified Amount of Winners for the Specified Prize
Invoke: giveaway <Mention Channel> <Amount of Time> <Amount of Winners> <Prize> <Prize Description>
Info: Days: d, Hours: h, Minutes: m, Seconds: s
The Prize Description is Optional. You Must put Quotes Before & After 2 or More Word Prizes

Auto-Mod (Bad Words).Description: Turns On Bad Words Auto-Moderation for Channel

Auto-Mod (Invites).Description: Turns On Discord Invite Auto-Moderation for Channel

Auto-Mod (Links).Description: Turns On External Link Auto-Moderation for Channel

Auto-Mod (Mentions).Description: Turns On Spam Mention Auto-Moderation for Channel

Auto-Mod (Caps).Description: Turns On Excessive Caps Auto-Moderation for Channel

Auto-Mod (Spam).Description: Turns On Spam Text Auto-Moderation for Channel

Auto-Role.Description: Sets Role to Auto-Assign on Join

Sticky Role Limit.Description: Sets Limit for Messages per 24 Hours for Mentioned Role in Sticky Channels

Sticky Channel Logs.Description: Sets the Channel to Receive Sticky Channel Advertisement Logs in

Sticky Reset.Description: Resets Sticky Channel Limits for the Server

Sticky Member Reset.Description: Resets Sticky Channel Limits for a Member in the Server

Sticky Member Remove.Description: Removes Specified Number of Posts from Sticky Channel Limit for a Member in the Server

Prefix.Description: Adds or Removes Prefix from Server's Prefixes

Mod Log.Description: Sets the Channel to Receive Moderation Actions Taken

Join & Leave Log.Description: Sets Channel to Receive Join & Leave Logs

Phone Call Channel.Description: Sets Channel to Receive Phone Calls in

%bot Announcements.Description: Sets Channel to Receive %bot's Announcements in

Unlink Member's Server Account.Description: Unlinks Specified Member's Server Subscription Account from their Discord Account

Admin Link Server Account.Description: Links Specified Member's Server Subscription Account to their Discord Account

Info: Use %EMAIL to Specify Where to Insert Subscriber Emails

Eval.Description: Executes Code and Returns the Output

Generate Krypto iOS Key.Description: Create or Delete Krypto iOS Mod Key

Krypto iOS Keys.Description: Shows All of Krypto's iOS Mod Keys

Auto-Bump.Description: Enables Auto-Bump for Mentioned Server ID

Server List.Description: Displays All Servers %bot is Currently in
